TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Regex extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

summary.span: 表示不可变的正则表达式。

span.span: Represents an immutable regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示.NET Framework 正则表达式引擎。The class represents the .NET Framework's regular expression engine. 它可用于快速分析大量的文本来查找特定的字符模式;若要提取、 编辑、 替换或删除文本子字符串;并将提取的字符串添加到集合以生成报表。It can be used to quickly parse large amounts of text to find specific character patterns; to extract, edit, replace, or delete text substrings; and to add the extracted strings to a collection to generate a report. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的主要兴趣是通过确定是否符合特定模式来验证一个字符串，则可以使用类。If your primary interest is to validate a string by determining whether it conforms to a particular pattern, you can use the class. 若要使用的正则表达式，定义你希望确定文本流中使用的语法中所述的模式[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。To use regular expressions, you define the pattern that you want to identify in a text stream by using the syntax documented in [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 接下来，您可以根据需要实例化对象。Next, you can optionally instantiate a object. 最后，调用执行某项操作，例如替换与正则表达式模式匹配的文本或识别的模式匹配的方法。Finally, you call a method that performs some operation, such as replacing text that matches the regular expression pattern, or identifying a pattern match. > [!NOTE] > 一些常见的正则表达式模式，请参阅[正则表达式示例](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-examples.md)。For some common regular expression patterns, see [Regular Expression Examples](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-examples.md). 也有大量的正则表达式模式，例如在一个联机库[常规 Expressions.info](https://www.regular-expressions.info/examples.html)。There are also a number of online libraries of regular expression patterns, such as the one at [Regular-Expressions.info](https://www.regular-expressions.info/examples.html). 详细了解使用类，请参阅本主题中的以下部分：For more information about using the class, see the following sections in this topic: - [正则表达式 vs。字符串方法Regex vs. String Methods](#regex_vs_string) - [静态端口与实例方法Static vs. Instance Methods](#static_vs_instance) - [执行正则表达式操作Performing Regular Expression Operations](#regex_ops) - [定义超时值Defining a Time-Out Value](#define_timeout) 若要详细了解正则表达式语言，请参阅[正则表达式语言 - 快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)，或下载和打印下面的小册子之一：For more information about the regular expression language, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) or download and print one of these brochures: [快速参考（Word (.docx) 格式）Quick Reference in Word (.docx) format](https://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.docx) [快速参考（PDF (.pdf) 格式）Quick Reference in PDF (.pdf) format](https://download.microsoft.com/download/D/2/4/D240EBF6-A9BA-4E4F-A63F-AEB6DA0B921C/Regular%20expressions%20quick%20reference.pdf) ## 正则表达式 vs。字符串方法Regex vs. String Methods 类包含多个可用于执行使用文本模式匹配的搜索和比较方法。The class includes several search and comparison methods that you can use to perform pattern matching with text. 例如， ， ，并方法确定字符串实例是否包含指定的子字符串; 并， ， ，和方法返回的起始一个字符串中指定的子字符串的位置。For example, the , , and methods determine whether a string instance contains a specified substring; and the , , , and methods return the starting position of a specified substring in a string. 使用的方法类时要搜索特定字符串。Use the methods of the class when you are searching for a specific string. 使用类时要搜索的字符串中的特定模式。Use the class when you are searching for a specific pattern in a string. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information and examples, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). [返回到备注Back to Remarks](#remarks) ## 静态端口与实例方法Static vs. Instance Methods 定义正则表达式模式后，可以将其提供给通过两种方式中的正则表达式引擎：After you define a regular expression pattern, you can provide it to the regular expression engine in either of two ways: - 通过实例化对象，表示正则表达式。By instantiating a object that represents the regular expression. 若要执行此操作，可以传递到正则表达式模式构造函数。To do this, you pass the regular expression pattern to a constructor. 一个对象是不可变; 当您实例化对象在正则表达式对象的正则表达式不能更改。A object is immutable; when you instantiate a object with a regular expression, that object's regular expression cannot be changed. - 通过提供正则表达式和要搜索的文本`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。By supplying both the regular expression and the text to search to a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 这使您可以使用正则表达式而无需显式创建对象。This enables you to use a regular expression without explicitly creating a object. 所有模式标识方法包括这两个静态和实例重载。All pattern identification methods include both static and instance overloads. 正则表达式引擎必须编译特定模式，然后才能使用该模式。The regular expression engine must compile a particular pattern before the pattern can be used. 因为对象是不可变，这是发生的一次性过程时调用类构造函数或静态方法。Because objects are immutable, this is a one-time procedure that occurs when a class constructor or a static method is called. 若要消除重复编译单个正则表达式的需求，正则表达式引擎缓存已编译的正则表达式的静态方法调用中使用。To eliminate the need to repeatedly compile a single regular expression, the regular expression engine caches the compiled regular expressions used in static method calls. 因此，正则表达式模式匹配方法提供可比较的性能，适用于静态和实例方法。As a result, regular expression pattern-matching methods offer comparable performance for static and instance methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在.NET Framework 版本 1.0 和 1.1 中，所有已编译正则表达式中，是否使用它们在实例或静态方法调用，缓存。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, all compiled regular expressions, whether they were used in instance or static method calls, were cached. 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，缓存仅在静态方法调用中使用正则表达式。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, only regular expressions used in static method calls are cached. 但是，缓存产生负面影响以下两种情况下的性能：However, caching can adversely affect performance in the following two cases: - 当您使用正则表达式对大量静态方法调用。When you use static method calls with a large number of regular expressions. 默认情况下，正则表达式引擎缓存 15 的最近使用过静态正则表达式。By default, the regular expression engine caches the 15 most recently used static regular expressions. 如果你的应用程序使用 15 个以上的静态正则表达式，则必须重新编译正则表达式。If your application uses more than 15 static regular expressions, some regular expressions must be recompiled. 若要防止此类重新编译，可以增加属性。To prevent this recompilation, you can increase the property. - 当您实例化新具有先前已编译的正则表达式的对象。When you instantiate new objects with regular expressions that have previously been compiled. 例如，以下代码定义文本流中找到重复的单词的正则表达式。For example, the following code defines a regular expression to locate duplicated words in a text stream. 尽管该示例使用单个正则表达式，但它实例化一个新对象来处理每个文本行。Although the example uses a single regular expression, it instantiates a new object to process each line of text. 这会导致每次迭代循环的重新编译的正则表达式。This results in the recompilation of the regular expression with each iteration of the loop. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Class.Caching#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.class.caching/cs/caching1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Class.Caching#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.class.caching/vb/caching1.vb#1)] 若要防止重新编译，您应实例化一个对象都可以访问的所有代码都需要它，如下面的重写示例中所示。To prevent recompilation, you should instantiate a single object that is accessible to all code that requires it, as shown in the following rewritten example. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Class.Caching#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.class.caching/cs/caching1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Class.Caching#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.class.caching/vb/caching1.vb#2)] [返回到备注Back to Remarks](#remarks) ## 执行正则表达式操作Performing Regular Expression Operations 你是否决定要实例化对象并调用其方法或调用静态方法，类提供了以下的模式匹配功能：Whether you decide to instantiate a object and call its methods or call static methods, the class offers the following pattern-matching functionality: - 匹配项的验证。Validation of a match. 在调用方法，以确定是否存在匹配项。You call the method to determine whether a match is present. - 检索单个匹配项。Retrieval of a single match. 在调用方法来检索对象，表示一个字符串或部分字符串的第一个匹配项。You call the method to retrieve a object that represents the first match in a string or in part of a string. 可以通过调用来检索后续匹配项方法。Subsequent matches can be retrieved by calling the method. - 检索的所有匹配项。Retrieval of all matches. 在调用方法来检索对象，表示找到的字符串的字符串或部分的所有匹配项。You call the method to retrieve a object that represents all the matches found in a string or in part of a string. - 替换匹配的文本。Replacement of matched text. 在调用方法替换匹配的文本。You call the method to replace matched text. 也可以由正则表达式定义的替换文本。The replacement text can also be defined by a regular expression. 此外，某些方法包括参数，它允许您以编程方式定义的替换文本。In addition, some of the methods include a parameter that enables you to programmatically define the replacement text. - 创建从输入字符串的部分构成的字符串数组。Creation of a string array that is formed from parts of an input string. 在调用方法拆分输入的字符串与正则表达式定义的位置。You call the method to split an input string at positions that are defined by the regular expression. 其模式匹配方法，除了类包括了一些特殊用途方法：In addition to its pattern-matching methods, the class includes several special-purpose methods: - 方法可转义可能被解释为正则表达式或输入的字符串中的正则表达式运算符的任何字符。The method escapes any characters that may be interpreted as regular expression operators in a regular expression or input string. - 方法中删除这些转义符。The method removes these escape characters. - 方法创建包含预定义的正则表达式的程序集。The method creates an assembly that contains predefined regular expressions. .NET Framework 包含在这些特殊用途的程序集的示例命名空间。The .NET Framework contains examples of these special-purpose assemblies in the namespace. [返回到备注Back to Remarks](#remarks) ## 定义超时值Defining a Time-Out Value .NET Framework 支持提供了大量功能和灵活性在模式匹配中的全功能正则表达式语言。The .NET Framework supports a full-featured regular expression language that provides substantial power and flexibility in pattern matching. 但是，功能和灵活性为代价： 性能不佳的风险。However, the power and flexibility come at a cost: the risk of poor performance. 执行效果不佳的正则表达式是创建起来极其方便。Regular expressions that perform poorly are surprisingly easy to create. 在某些情况下，依赖于过度回溯正则表达式操作可以出现停止响应时它们处理与正则表达式模式大致匹配的文本。In some cases, regular expression operations that rely on excessive backtracking can appear to stop responding when they process text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern. 有关.NET Framework 正则表达式引擎的详细信息，请参阅[的正则表达式行为的详细信息](~/docs/standard/base-types/details-of-regular-expression-behavior.md)。For more information about the .NET Framework regular expression engine, see [Details of Regular Expression Behavior](~/docs/standard/base-types/details-of-regular-expression-behavior.md). 有关过度回溯的详细信息，请参阅[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about excessive backtracking, see [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md). 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，可以定义超时间隔的正则表达式匹配项。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can define a time-out interval for regular expression matches. 如果正则表达式引擎不能识别在此时间间隔内的匹配项，匹配的操作将引发异常。If the regular expression engine cannot identify a match within this time interval, the matching operation throws a exception. 在大多数情况下，这可以防止正则表达式引擎尝试匹配与正则表达式模式大致匹配的文本而浪费处理能力。In most cases, this prevents the regular expression engine from wasting processing power by trying to match text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern. 它还可能表示，但是的超时间隔设置得过低，或当前计算机负载性能，导致整体性能降低。It also could indicate, however, that the timeout interval has been set too low, or that the current machine load has caused an overall degradation in performance. 如何处理异常取决于异常的原因。How you handle the exception depends on the cause of the exception. 如果因为超时间隔设置得太低，会发生异常，或者由于过多机负载，可以增大超时间隔和重试匹配操作。If the exception occurs because the time-out interval is set too low or because of excessive machine load, you can increase the time-out interval and retry the matching operation. 如果发生异常的原因的正则表达式依赖于过度回溯，可以假定不存在匹配项，并 （可选） 你可以记录信息将帮助您修改正则表达式模式。If the exception occurs because the regular expression relies on excessive backtracking, you can assume that a match does not exist, and, optionally, you can log information that will help you modify the regular expression pattern. 可以通过调用设置的超时间隔构造函数实例化正则表达式对象时。You can set a time-out interval by calling the constructor when you instantiate a regular expression object. 对于静态方法，可以设置超时间隔，通过调用具有匹配方法的重载`matchTimeout`参数。For static methods, you can set a time-out interval by calling an overload of a matching method that has a `matchTimeout` parameter. 如果未显式设置超时值，默认超时值确定，如下所示：If you do not set a time-out value explicitly, the default time-out value is determined as follows: - 通过使用应用程序范围内超时的值，如果一个存在。By using the application-wide time-out value, if one exists. 这可以是适用于的应用程序域中任何超时值实例化对象或调用静态方法。This can be any time-out value that applies to the application domain in which the object is instantiated or the static method call is made. 可以通过调用设置的应用程序范围的超时值方法将指定的字符串表示形式"REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"属性值。You can set the application-wide time-out value by calling the method to assign the string representation of a value to the "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" property. - 通过使用值，如果已不设置任何应用程序范围的超时值。By using the value , if no application-wide time-out value has been set. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们建议在所有正则表达式模式匹配操作设置超时值。We recommend that you set a time-out value in all regular expression pattern-matching operations. 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md). [返回到备注Back to Remarks](#remarks) ## Examples 以下示例使用正则表达式检查重复出现的字符串中的单词。The following example uses a regular expression to check for repeated occurrences of words in a string. 正则表达式`\b(?\w+)\s+(\k)\b`可以解释为下表中所示。The regular expression `\b(?\w+)\s+(\k)\b` can be interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|开始在字边界匹配。Start the match at a word boundary.| |`(?\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符，最多字边界。Match one or more word characters up to a word boundary. 命名此捕获的组`word`。Name this captured group `word`.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空白字符。Match one or more white-space characters.| |`(\k)`|与名为的捕获的组匹配`word`。Match the captured group that is named `word`.| |`\b`|与字边界匹配。Match a word boundary.| [!code-cpp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CPP/words.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/CS/words.cs#0)] [!code-vb[Regex_Words#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Regex_Words/VB/words.vb#0)] 下面的示例演示如何使用正则表达式来检查是否一个字符串，或者表示货币值，或者具有正确的格式来表示货币值。The following example illustrates the use of a regular expression to check whether a string either represents a currency value or has the correct format to represent a currency value. 在这种情况下，正则表达式动态生成从， ， ， ，和用户的当前区域性的属性。In this case, the regular expression is built dynamically from the , , , , and properties for the user's current culture. 如果系统的当前区域性为 EN-US，所生成的正则表达式是`^\s*[\+-]?\s?\$?\s?(\d*\.?\d{2}?){1}$`。If the system's current culture is en-US, the resulting regular expression is `^\s*[\+-]?\s?\$?\s?(\d*\.?\d{2}?){1}$`. 下表中所示，可以解释此正则表达式。This regular expression can be interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`^`|从字符串的开头。Start at the beginning of the string.| |`\s*`|匹配零个或多个空白字符。Match zero or more white-space characters.| |`[\+-]?`|匹配正号或负号的零个或一个匹配的项。Match zero or one occurrence of either the positive sign or the negative sign.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one white-space character.| |`\$?`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的美元符号。Match zero or one occurrence of the dollar sign.| |`\s?`|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one white-space character.| |`\d*`|匹配零个或多个十进制数字。Match zero or more decimal digits.| |`\.?`|匹配零个或一个小数点符号。Match zero or one decimal point symbol.| |`\d{2}?`|与两个十进制数字匹配零个或一个时间。Match two decimal digits zero or one time.| |`(\d*\.?\d{2}?){1}`|匹配模式的至少一次分隔小数点符号的整数和小数位数。Match the pattern of integral and fractional digits separated by a decimal point symbol at least one time.| |`$`|匹配字符串的末尾。Match the end of the string.| 正则表达式在这种情况下，假定的有效货币字符串不包含组分隔符符号，并且它具有没有小数部分位数或小数位数由当前区域性定义属性。In this case, the regular expression assumes that a valid currency string does not contain group separator symbols, and that it has either no fractional digits or the number of fractional digits defined by the current culture's property. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.class/cs/regex_example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.class/vb/regex_example1.vb#1)] 因为动态生成正则表达式在此示例中，我们不知道在设计时是否当前区域性的货币符号、 十进制符号或正和负号可能会错误地解释为正则正则表达式引擎表达式语言运算符。Because the regular expression in this example is built dynamically, we do not know at design time whether the current culture's currency symbol, decimal sign, or positive and negative signs might be misinterpreted by the regular expression engine as regular expression language operators. 若要防止出现任何错误解释，该示例将为每个动态生成的字符串方法。To prevent any misinterpretation, the example passes each dynamically generated string to the method.

threadsafe.span: 可以在任何线程上创建对象，并将其线程之间共享。

span.span: objects can be created on any thread and shared between threads.

span.span: For more information, see [Thread Safety](~/docs/standard/base-types/thread-safety-in-regular-expressions.md).

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified regular expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pattern`参数包含的符号描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)并[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics. 调用构造函数是等效于调用构造函数，值为为`options`参数。Calling the constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor with a value of for the `options` argument. 一个对象是不可变的这意味着，它可以仅用于在创建它时定义的匹配模式。A object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match pattern you define when you create it. 但是，可能没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled. 此构造函数实例化正则表达式对象的定义中的任意字母字符区分大小写的匹配项时，尝试`pattern`。This constructor instantiates a regular expression object that attempts a case-sensitive match of any alphabetical characters defined in `pattern`. 对于不区分大小写的匹配项，请使用构造函数。For a case-insensitive match, use the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数来实例化正则表达式相匹配的单词的开头的字母"a"或"t"。The following example illustrates how to use this constructor to instantiate a regular expression that matches any word that begins with the letters "a" or "t". [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors/cs/constructors1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors/vb/constructors1.vb#1)] 请注意，正则表达式模式不能与匹配单词"The"开头的文本，因为比较是区分大小写的默认值。Note that the regular expression pattern cannot match the word "The" at the beginning of the text, because comparisons are case-sensitive by default. 不区分大小写比较的示例，请参阅构造函数。For an example of case-insensitive comparison, see the constructor.

span.para: 此构造函数创建使用在其中创建应用程序域的默认超时值的对象。如果不为应用程序域中，定义了超时值对象使用的值，这将阻止该操作超时。用于创建建议的构造函数对象是，它允许您设置的超时间隔。

This constructor creates a object that uses the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is created. If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the object uses the value , which prevents the operation from timing out. The recommended constructor for creating a object is , which lets you set the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pattern`参数包含的符号描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)并[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics. 一个对象是不可变的这意味着可以使用用于在创建它时定义匹配参数。A object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match parameters you define when you create it. 但是，可能没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数来实例化正则表达式相匹配的单词的开头的字母"a"或"t"。The following example illustrates how to use this constructor to instantiate a regular expression that matches any word that begins with the letters "a" or "t". [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors/cs/Constructors2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Constructors/vb/Constructors2.vb#2)] 请注意，匹配集合包含的单词"The"，因为文本开头`options`参数定义了不区分大小写的比较。Note that the match collection includes the word "The" that begins the text because the `options` parameter has defined case-insensitive comparisons.

summary.span: 使用修改模式的选项和指定在超时前多久模式匹配方法应进行匹配尝试的值为指定正则表达式初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified regular expression, with options that modify the pattern and a value that specifies how long a pattern matching method should attempt a match before it times out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pattern`参数包含的符号描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)并[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)主题。For more information about regular expressions, see the [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md) topics. 一个对象是不可变的这意味着可以使用仅为创建时定义的匹配模式。A object is immutable, which means that it can be used only for the match pattern that you define when you create it. 但是，可能没有正在重新编译的情况下使用任意次数。However, it can be used any number of times without being recompiled. `matchTimeout`参数指定多长时间模式匹配方法应尝试超时之前找到匹配项。如果在该时间间隔内不找到任何匹配项，模式匹配方法将引发异常。The `matchTimeout` parameter specifies how long a pattern-matching method should try to find a match before it times out. If no match is found in that time interval, the pattern-matching method throws a exception. `matchTimeout` 重写任何定义的应用程序域中的默认超时值创建对象。`matchTimeout` overrides any default time-out value defined for the application domain in which the object is created. 观察到的实例模式匹配方法`matchTimeout`超时间隔包括以下：The instance pattern-matching methods that observe the `matchTimeout` time-out interval include the following: - - - - - - 将设置的超时间隔可阻止依赖于过度回溯出现停止响应时它们处理输入的正则表达式，其中包含接近的匹配项。Setting a time-out interval prevents regular expressions that rely on excessive backtracking from appearing to stop responding when they process input that contains near matches. 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)并[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md) and [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md). 若要设置合理的超时间隔，请考虑以下因素：To set a reasonable time-out interval, consider the following factors: - 长度和复杂性的正则表达式模式。The length and complexity of the regular expression pattern. 长而复杂的正则表达式需要比更简短和简单的更多的时间。Longer and more complex regular expressions require more time than shorter and simpler ones. - 预期的机负载。The expected machine load. 处理将更多的时间会有 CPU 和内存使用率高的系统上。Processing takes more time on systems that have high CPU and memory utilization. ## Examples 下面的示例调用构造函数实例化一秒的超时值的对象。The following example calls the constructor to instantiate a object with a time-out value of one second. 正则表达式模式 `(a+)+$`（与行尾的一个或多个“a”字符的一个或多个序列匹配）受过度回溯的约束。The regular expression pattern `(a+)+$`, which matches one or more sequences of one or more "a" characters at the end of a line, is subject to excessive backtracking. 如果是引发，该示例会增大到三秒的最大值的超时值。If a is thrown, the example increases the time-out value up to the maximum value of three seconds. 否则，它放弃尝试与模式匹配。Otherwise, it abandons the attempt to match the pattern. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ctor/cs/ctor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ctor/vb/ctor1.vb#1)]

-or-

exception.span: 为负、零或大于 24 天左右。

span.span: is negative, zero, or greater than approximately 24 days.

span.para: 我们建议您将设置为适当的值，如两秒的参数。如果通过指定禁用超时，正则表达式引擎提供了略有更好的性能。但是，应禁用超时值仅在以下情况下:-当输入由正则表达式处理派生自已知和受信任的来源或包含静态文本。这不包括具有动态已由用户输入的文本。 -当经过全面测试正则表达式模式以确保它有效地处理匹配，不匹配，并不久匹配。 -当正则表达式模式不包含任何已知会导致过度回溯，处理接近的匹配项时的语言元素。

We recommend that you set the parameter to an appropriate value, such as two seconds. If you disable time-outs by specifying , the regular expression engine offers slightly better performance. However, you should disable time-outs only under the following conditions: - When the input processed by a regular expression is derived from a known and trusted source or consists of static text. This excludes text that has been dynamically input by users. - When the regular expression pattern has been thoroughly tested to ensure that it efficiently handles matches, non-matches, and near matches. - When the regular expression pattern contains no language elements that are known to cause excessive backtracking when processing a near match.

summary.span: 获取或设置已编译的正则表达式的当前静态缓存中的最大项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of entries in the current static cache of compiled regular expressions.

value.span: 静态缓存中的最大项数。

span.span: The maximum number of entries in the static cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类维护的静态方法调用中使用的已编译正则表达式的内部缓存。The class maintains an internal cache of compiled regular expressions used in static method calls. 如果在设置操作中指定的值小于当前缓存大小，直到缓存大小是否等于指定的值会丢弃缓存项。If the value specified in a set operation is less than the current cache size, cache entries are discarded until the cache size is equal to the specified value. 默认情况下，缓存包含 15 个已编译的静态正则表达式。By default, the cache holds 15 compiled static regular expressions. 你的应用程序通常不会修改缓存的大小。Your application typically will not have to modify the size of the cache. 使用属性仅当你想要关闭缓存，或当你具有较大的缓存。Use the property only when you want to turn off caching or when you have an unusually large cache.

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than zero.

span.para: 在之前的.NET Framework 中[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]、 正则表达式使用在这两个静态和实例方法调用缓存。从[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]、 仅正则表达式的静态方法调用中使用的缓存。

In the .NET Framework prior to the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], regular expressions used in both static and instance method calls were cached. Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], only regular expressions used in static method calls are cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Core 上调用`Regex.CompileToAssembly`方法引发; 不支持写出程序集。On .NET Core, calls to the `Regex.CompileToAssembly` method throw a ; writing out an assembly is not supported.

summary.span: 将一个或多个指定的 对象编译为命名程序集。

span.span: Compiles one or more specified objects to a named assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中定义的每个正则表达式中生成.NET Framework 程序集`regexinfos`由一个类表示数组。The method generates a .NET Framework assembly in which each regular expression defined in the `regexinfos` array is represented by a class. 通常情况下，从单独的应用程序生成的已编译的正则表达式的程序集调用方法。Typically, the method is called from a separate application that generates an assembly of compiled regular expressions. 包含在程序集中的每个正则表达式具有以下特征：Each regular expression included in the assembly has the following characteristics: - 派生自类。It is derived from the class. - 它分配由定义的完全限定的名称`fullnamespace`并`name`其对应的参数对象。It is assigned the fully qualified name that is defined by the `fullnamespace` and `name` parameters of its corresponding object. - 它有一个默认的 （或无参数） 构造函数。It has a default (or parameterless) constructor. 通常，程序集或应用程序，它独立于创建该程序集的代码中找到实例化并使用已编译的正则表达式的代码。Ordinarily, the code that instantiates and uses the compiled regular expression is found in an assembly or application that is separate from the code that creates the assembly. ## Examples 以下示例创建名为 RegexLib.dll 程序集。The following example creates an assembly named RegexLib.dll. 程序集包括两个已编译的正则表达式。The assembly includes two compiled regular expressions. 第一种`Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`，匹配两个完全相同的连续单词。The first, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`, matches two identical contiguous words. 第二个， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`，检查字符串是否具有正确的格式为电子邮件地址。The second, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`, checks whether a string has the correct format to be an email address. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/cs/Compile1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/vb/Compile1.vb#1)] 然后，检查字符串的重复单词的正则表达式是实例化，并使用下面的示例。The regular expression that checks a string for duplicate words is then instantiated and used by the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/cs/Compile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/vb/Compile2.vb#2)] 此第二个示例成功编译需要对 RegexLib.dll （由第一个示例创建程序集） 的引用添加到项目。Successful compilation of this second example requires a reference to RegexLib.dll (the assembly created by the first example) to be added to the project.

exception.span: 仅 .NET Core：不支持创建已编译的正则表达式的程序集。

span.span: .NET Core only: Creating an assembly of compiled regular expressions is not supported.

span.para: 如果你正在开发的系统上[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]或安装其单点发行版，面向[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，并使用方法创建的程序集包含已编译的正则表达式。尝试使用正则表达式之一在于，在系统上的程序集具有[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]将引发异常。若要解决此问题，可以执行以下任一操作:-生成包含已编译的正则表达式的系统上的程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]而不是安装更高版本。 -而不是调用和从程序集中检索已编译的正则表达式，使用静态或实例方法使用选项实例化时对象或调用正则表达式模式匹配方法。

If you are developing on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] or its point releases installed, you target [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], and you use the method to create an assembly that contains compiled regular expressions. Trying to use one of the regular expressions in that assembly on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] throws an exception. To work around this problem, you can do either of the following: - Build the assembly that contains the compiled regular expressions on a system that has [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] instead of later versions installed. - Instead of calling and retrieving the compiled regular expression from an assembly, use either static or instance methods with the option when you instantiate a object or call a regular expression pattern matching method.

span.span: Compiles one or more specified objects to a named assembly with the specified attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中定义的每个正则表达式中生成.NET Framework 程序集`regexinfos`由一个类表示数组。The method generates a .NET Framework assembly in which each regular expression defined in the `regexinfos` array is represented by a class. 通常情况下，从单独的应用程序生成的已编译的正则表达式的程序集调用方法。Typically, the method is called from a separate application that generates an assembly of compiled regular expressions. 包含在程序集中的每个正则表达式具有以下特征：Each regular expression included in the assembly has the following characteristics: - 派生自类。It is derived from the class. - 它分配由定义的完全限定的名称`fullnamespace`并`name`其对应的参数对象。It is assigned the fully qualified name that is defined by the `fullnamespace` and `name` parameters of its corresponding object. - 它有一个默认的 （或无参数） 构造函数。It has a default (or parameterless) constructor. 通常，程序集或应用程序，它独立于创建该程序集的代码中找到实例化并使用已编译的正则表达式的代码。Ordinarily, the code that instantiates and uses the compiled regular expression is found in an assembly or application that is separate from the code that creates the assembly. 因为方法生成的.NET Framework 程序集从方法调用而不是使用特定语言的类定义关键字 (如`class`C# 中或`Class`...`End Class`Because the method generates a .NET Framework assembly from a method call instead of using a particular language's class definition keyword (such as `class` in C# or `Class`…`End Class` 在 Visual Basic 中)，它不允许使用开发语言的标准属性语法要分配给该程序集的.NET Framework 属性。in Visual Basic), it does not allow .NET Framework attributes to be assigned to the assembly by using the development language's standard attribute syntax. `attributes`参数提供了一种替代方法，用于定义应用于程序集的属性。The `attributes` parameter provides an alternative method for defining the attributes that apply to the assembly. 你想要应用于程序集的每个属性，请执行以下操作：For each attribute that you want to apply to the assembly, do the following: 1. 创建一个数组表示你想要调用的特性构造函数的参数类型的对象。Create an array of objects representing the parameter types of the attribute constructor that you want to call. 2. 检索对象，表示你想要将应用于新的程序集的特性类。Retrieve a object representing the attribute class that you want to apply to the new assembly. 3. 调用方法的特性对象来检索对象，表示你想要调用的特性构造函数。Call the method of the attribute object to retrieve a object representing the attribute constructor that you want to call. 传递方法的数组的表示构造函数的参数类型的对象。Pass the method the array of objects that represents the constructor's parameter types. 4. 创建定义要传递给特性的构造函数的参数的数组。Create a array that defines the parameters to pass to the attribute's constructor. 5. 实例化对象表示通过其构造函数在步骤 3 中检索对象和步骤 4 中创建的数组。Instantiate a object by passing its constructor the object retrieved in step 3 and the array created in step 4. 然后，可以传递这些对象而不是`attributes`参数方法。You can then pass an array of these objects instead of the `attributes` parameter to the method. ## Examples 以下示例创建名为 RegexLib.dll 的程序集并应用到该属性。The following example creates an assembly named RegexLib.dll and applies the attribute to it. 程序集包括两个已编译的正则表达式。The assembly includes two compiled regular expressions. 第一种`Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`，匹配两个完全相同的连续单词。The first, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.DuplicatedString`, matches two identical contiguous words. 第二个， `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`，检查字符串是否具有正确的格式为电子邮件地址。The second, `Utilities.RegularExpressions.EmailAddress`, checks whether a string has the correct format to be an email address. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/cs/Compile3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/vb/Compile3.vb#3)] 你可以验证特性已应用于程序集通过检查其清单使用 ILDasm 之类的反射实用工具。You can verify that the attribute has been applied to the assembly by examining its manifest with a reflection utility such as ILDasm. 然后，检查字符串的重复单词的正则表达式是实例化，并使用下面的示例。The regular expression that checks a string for duplicate words is then instantiated and used by the following example. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/cs/Compile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.CompileToAssembly/vb/Compile2.vb#2)] 此第二个示例成功编译需要对 RegexLib.dll （由第一个示例创建程序集） 的引用添加到项目。Successful compilation of this second example requires a reference to RegexLib.dll (the assembly created by the first example) to be added to the project.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Escape (string str);
.method public static hidebysig string Escape(string str) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (str As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ Escape(System::String ^ str);
static member Escape : string -> string

param.name: str
param.span: 包含要转换的文本的输入字符串。

span.span: The input string that contains the text to convert.

summary.span: 通过替换为转义码来转义最小的字符集（\\、\*、+、?、|、{、[、(、)、^、$、.、# 和空白）。

span.span: Escapes a minimal set of characters (\\, \*, +, ?, |, {, [, (,), ^, $,., #, and white space) by replacing them with their escape codes.

summary.span: 这将指示正则表达式引擎按原义解释这些字符而不是解释为元字符。

span.span: This instructs the regular expression engine to interpret these characters literally rather than as metacharacters.

returns.span: 由转换为转义形式的元字符组成的字符串。

span.span: A string of characters with metacharacters converted to their escaped form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将字符串转换，以便正则表达式引擎会将解释为字符文本可能包含任何元字符。 converts a string so that the regular expression engine will interpret any metacharacters that it may contain as character literals. 例如，考虑正则表达式，它可以提取由左和右括号 （[和]） 从文本分隔的注释。For example, consider a regular expression that is designed to extract comments that are delimited by straight opening and closing brackets ([ and ]) from text. 在下面的示例中，正则表达式"[(.\*?)]"被解释为字符类。In the following example, the regular expression "[(.\*?)]" is interpreted as a character class. 而不是匹配输入文本中嵌入的注释，正则表达式匹配每个左或右括号、 句点、 星号或问号。Rather than matching comments embedded in the input text, the regular expression matches each opening or closing parenthesis, period, asterisk, or question mark. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/cs/Escape1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/vb/Escape1.vb#1)] 但是，如果将左大括号转义将其传递到方法，正则表达式成功匹配输入字符串中嵌入的注释中。However, if the opening bracket is escaped by passing it to the method, the regular expression succeeds in matching comments that are embedded in the input string. 下面的示例阐释了这一点。The following example illustrates this. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/cs/Escape1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/vb/Escape1.vb#2)] 使用静态文本定义的正则表达式，将按字面意思而不是元字符作为解释的字符也可转义由其前面的反斜杠符号 (\\) 以及通过调用方法。In a regular expression that is defined by using static text, characters that are to be interpreted literally rather than as metacharacters can be escaped by preceding them with a backslash symbol (\\) as well as by calling the method. 使用在设计时未知的字符以动态方式定义正则表达式中调用方法是确保，正则表达式引擎将单个字符解释为文本而不是非常重要比为元字符。In a regular expression that is defined dynamically using characters that are not known at design time, calling the method is particularly important to ensure that the regular expression engine interprets individual characters as literals rather than as metacharacters. > [!NOTE] > 如果正则表达式模式包含的数字符号 （#） 或文本空白字符，则必须进行转义如果输入的文本分析与选项处于启用状态。If a regular expression pattern includes either the number sign (#) or literal white-space characters, they must be escaped if input text is parsed with the option enabled. 虽然方法可转义直接打开方括号 ([)，并打开大括号 （{） 字符，它未转义其对应的结束字符 (] 和})。While the method escapes the straight opening bracket ([) and opening brace ({) characters, it does not escape their corresponding closing characters (] and }). 在大多数情况下，转义这些不是必需。In most cases, escaping these is not necessary. 如果右括号或大括号前面没有其相应的开始字符，正则表达式引擎将按字面意思解释它。If a closing bracket or brace is not preceded by its corresponding opening character, the regular expression engine interprets it literally. 如果左括号或大括号被解释为元字符，正则表达式引擎会解释第一个相应的结束字符为元字符。If an opening braket or brace is interpreted as a metacharacter, the regular expression engine interprets the first corresponding closing character as a metacharacter. 如果这不是所需的行为，应通过显式预先计算的反斜杠转义右括号或大括号 (\\) 字符。If this is not the desired behavior, the closing bracket or brace should be escaped by explicitly prepending the backslash (\\) character. 有关说明，请参阅示例部分。For an illustration, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的示例从文本中提取注释。The following example extracts comments from text. 它假定注释分隔开始注释符号，并由用户选择的结束注释符号。It assumes that the comments are delimited by a begin comment symbol and an end comment symbol that is selected by the user. 注释符号将按原义解释，因为它们传递给方法，以确保它们不能被曲解为元字符。Because the comment symbols are to be interpreted literally, they are passed to the method to ensure that they cannot be misinterpreted as metacharacters. 此外，该示例显式检查用户输入的结束注释符号是否为右方括号 (]) 或大括号 （}）。In addition, the example explicitly checks whether the end comment symbol entered by the user is a closing bracket (]) or brace (}). 如果是，反斜杠字符 (\\)，以便将按字面意思解释预置到大括号或大括号。If it is, a backslash character (\\) is prepended to the bracket or brace so that it is interpreted literally. 请注意，此示例还使用集合以显示注释，而不是其开始和结束注释符号以及注释。Note that the example also uses the collection to display the comment only, rather than the comment together with its opening and closing comment symbols. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/cs/Escape3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Escape/vb/Escape3.vb#3)]

summary.span: 返回正则表达式的捕获组名数组。

span.span: Returns an array of capturing group names for the regular expression.

returns.span: 组名的字符串数组。

span.span: A string array of group names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组名称的集合包含在表达式中的命名捕获组使用的字符串的集合。The collection of group names contains the set of strings used to name capturing groups in the expression. 即使未显式命名的捕获组，它们会自动分配了数字名称 （"0"、"1"、"2"、"3"等）。Even if capturing groups are not explicitly named, they are automatically assigned numerical names ("0", "1", "2", "3", and so on). "0"名为组表示由正则表达式模式匹配的所有文本。The "0" named group represents all text matched by the regular expression pattern. 已编号的组先于显式命名的组在集合中，并已命名的组显示在正则表达式模式中定义的顺序。Numbered groups precede explicitly named groups in the collection, and named groups appear in the order in which they are defined in the regular expression pattern. 可以使用属性返回此方法以确定正则表达式中的组数的数组。You can use the property on the array returned by this method to determine the number of groups in a regular expression. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了常规用途`ShowMatches`显示正则表达式组和其匹配的文本的名称的方法。The following example defines a general-purpose `ShowMatches` method that displays the names of regular expression groups and their matched text. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GetGroupNames#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.getgroupnames/cs/getgroupnames1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GetGroupNames#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.getgroupnames/vb/getgroupnames1.vb#1)] 在此情况下，正则表达式模式`\b(?\w+)\s?((\w+)\s)*(?\w+)?(?\p{Po})`旨在分析简单句子，并确定其第一个单词，最后一个单词和结束标点符号。In this case, the regular expression pattern `\b(?\w+)\s?((\w+)\s)*(?\w+)?(?\p{Po})` is intended to parse a simple sentence, and to identify its first word, last word, and ending punctuation mark. 下表显示了如何解释正则表达式模式：The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted: |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|在单词边界处开始匹配。Begin the match at a word boundary.| |`(?\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符。Match one or more word characters. 这是`FirstWord`已命名的组。This is the `FirstWord` named group.| |\s？\s?|匹配零个或一个空白字符。Match zero or one white-space characters.| |(\w+)(\w+)|匹配一个或多个单词字符。Match one or more word characters. 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.| |\s\s|与空白字符匹配。Match a white-space character.| |((\w+)\s)\*((\w+)\s)\*|匹配零个或多个匹配项的一个或多个单词字符后跟空白区域。Match zero or more occurrences of one or more word characters followed by a white space. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |(?\ \w+)？(?\\w+)?|匹配零个或一个匹配项的一个或多个单词字符。Match zero or one occurrence of one or more word characters. 这是`LastWord`已命名的组。This is the `LastWord` named group.| |(?\<标点 > \p{Po})(?\\p{Po})|匹配的字符的 Unicode 类别是标点，其他。Match a character whose Unicode category is Punctuation, Other. 这是`Punctuation`已命名的组。This is the `Punctuation` named group.|

summary.span: 返回与数组中的组名相对应的捕获组号的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of capturing group numbers that correspond to group names in an array.

returns.span: 组号的整数数组。

span.span: An integer array of group numbers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过数字访问未命名和已命名的捕获组。Both unnamed and named capturing groups can be accessed by number. 未命名的组从左到右从 1 开始编号。Unnamed groups are numbered from left to right starting with 1. （索引 0 （零） 中的捕获组表示匹配作为一个整体。）已命名的组进行然后编号从左到右从一个更大的数字比的数未命名捕获组。(The capturing group in index 0 (zero) represents the match as a whole.) Named groups are then numbered from left to right starting with a number that is one greater than the number of unnamed capturing groups. 通过字符串名称来引用其数量，而不是通过组可以提供更快的访问。Referencing a group by its number instead of by string name can provide faster access. ## Examples 下面的示例定义正则表达式， `\b((?\w+)\s*)+(?[.?!])`，匹配的句子。The following example defines a regular expression, `\b((?\w+)\s*)+(?[.?!])`, that matches a sentence. 正则表达式包含三个捕获组： 捕获各个单词，连同空格字符，可以按照它; 未命名的组名为的组`word`捕获句子; 中的单个单词和一组名为`end`捕获结束句子的标点。The regular expression includes three capturing groups: an unnamed group that captures an individual word along with a space character that may follow it; a group named `word` that captures the individual words in the sentence; and a group named `end` that captures the punctuation that ends the sentence. 此示例调用方法以获取所有捕获的数字进行分组，，然后显示其捕获的字符串。The example calls the method to get the numbers of all capturing groups, and then displays their captured string. 此外，方法用来指示特定编号的组是否对应于命名的组。In addition, the method is used to indicate whether a particular numbered group corresponds to a named group. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GetGroupNumbers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.getgroupnumbers/cs/getgroupnumbers1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GetGroupNumbers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.getgroupnumbers/vb/getgroupnumbers1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式可以解释为下表中所示内容。The regular expression pattern is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|在单词边界处开始匹配。Begin the match at a word boundary.| |`(?\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符并将匹配的字符串分配给一个名为组`word`。Match one or more word characters and assign the matched strings to a group named `word`.| |`\s*`|匹配零个或多个空白字符。Match zero or more white-space characters.| |`((?\w+)\s*)`|分配`word`跟任何的捕获的组捕获的空白字符到第一个捕获组。Assign the `word` captured group followed by any captured white-space characters to the first captured group.| |`((?\w+)\s*)+`|与任何空白字符后, 接一个或多个时间的一个或多个单词字符的模式匹配。Match the pattern of one or more word characters followed by any white-space characters one or more times.| |`(?[.?!])`|匹配句号、问号或感叹号。Match a period, question mark, or exclamation point. 将分配到的匹配的字符`end`捕获组。Assign the matched character to the `end` capturing group.|

MemberSignature.Value: public string GroupNameFromNumber (int i);

param.span: 要转换为相应组名的组号。

summary.span: 获取与指定组号相对应的组名。

span.span: Gets the group name that corresponds to the specified group number.

returns.span: 包含与指定组号关联的组名的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the group name associated with the specified group number.

returns.span: 如果没有与 对应的组名，此方法会返回 。

span.span: If there is no group name that corresponds to , the method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正则表达式模式可能包含已命名或编号的捕获组，其中描述中的模式匹配的子表达式。A regular expression pattern may contain either named or numbered capturing groups, which delineate subexpressions within a pattern match. 分隔语法已编号的组 (*子表达式*) 和分配有根据正则表达式中其顺序的编号。Numbered groups are delimited by the syntax (*subexpression*) and are assigned numbers based on their order in the regular expression. 已命名的组进行分隔语法 (？`<`*名称*`>`*subexpression*) 或 (？*名称*'*subexpression*)，其中*名称*是子表达式将标识的名称。Named groups are delimited by the syntax (?`<`*name*`>`*subexpression*) or (?'*name*'*subexpression*), where *name* is the name by which the subexpression will be identified. （有关详细信息，请参阅[分组构造](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md)。）方法标识为命名的组和正则表达式中其序号位置的已编号的组。(For more information, see [Grouping Constructs](~/docs/standard/base-types/grouping-constructs-in-regular-expressions.md).) The method identifies both named groups and numbered groups by their ordinal positions in the regular expression. 序号位置 0 始终表示整个正则表达式。Ordinal position zero always represents the entire regular expression. 所有带编号组然后进行计数之前已命名的组，而不考虑其在正则表达式模式中的实际位置。All numbered groups are then counted before named groups, regardless of their actual position in the regular expression pattern. 如果`i`是数的命名组，该方法返回的组的名称。If `i` is the number of a named group, the method returns the name of the group. 如果`i`是数字的未命名的组，该方法返回数字的字符串表示形式。If `i` is the number of an unnamed group, the method returns the string representation of the number. 例如，如果`i`为 1，该方法将返回"1"。For example, if `i` is 1, the method returns "1". 如果`i`不是数字的捕获组，该方法将返回。If `i` is not the number of a capturing group, the method returns . 如果找到的模式匹配，则此方法返回的值然后将用于检索对象，表示从捕获的组属性。If a pattern match is found, the value returned by this method can then be used to retrieve the object that represents the captured group from the property. 返回对象属性。The object is returned by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例定义匹配包含美国城市名称、 状态名称和邮政编码的地址行的正则表达式模式。The following example defines a regular expression pattern that matches an address line containing a U.S. city name, state name, and zip code. 该示例使用方法来检索捕获组的名称。The example uses the method to retrieve the names of capturing groups. 然后使用这些名称来检索相应的捕获的组的匹配项。It then uses these names to retrieve the corresponding captured groups for matches. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GroupNameFromNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.groupnamefromnumber/cs/groupnamefromnumberex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.GroupNameFromNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.groupnamefromnumber/vb/groupnamefromnumberex.vb#1)] 以下表达式所定义的正则表达式模式：The regular expression pattern is defined by the following expression: `(?[A-Za-z\s]+), (?[A-Za-z]{2}) (?\d{5}(-\d{4})?)` 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(?[A-Za-z\s]+)`|匹配一个或多个字母或空格字符。Match one or more alphabetic or white-space character. 将此捕获的组的名称分配`city`。Assign this captured group the name `city`.| |`,`|匹配后跟一个空白字符的逗号 （，）。Match a comma (,) followed by a white-space character.| |`(?[A-Za-z]{2})`|匹配两个字母字符。Match two alphabetic characters. 将此捕获的组的名称分配`state`。Assign this captured group the name `state`. 此组应跟一个空白字符。This group should be followed by a white-space character.| |`(?\d{5}(-\d{4})?)`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的连字符后跟四个数字后跟五个数字。Match five numeric digits followed by either zero or one occurrence of a hyphen followed by four digits. 将此捕获的组的名称分配`zip`。Assign this captured group the name `zip`.|

The method identifies both named groups and numbered groups by their ordinal positions in the regular expression. 序号位置 0 始终表示整个正则表达式。Ordinal position zero always represents the entire regular expression. 所有带编号组然后进行计数之前已命名的组，而不考虑其在正则表达式模式中的实际位置。All numbered groups are then counted before named groups, regardless of their actual position in the regular expression pattern. 如果`name`存在在正则表达式模式中，此方法返回该编号的组数字的字符串表示形式。If `name` is the string representation of a group number that is present in the regular expression pattern, the method returns that number. 如果`name`对应于已命名捕获在正则表达式模式中存在的组，该方法返回其对应的编号。If `name` corresponds to a named capturing group that is present in the regular expression pattern, the method returns its corresponding number. 比较`name`与组名称是区分大小写。The comparison of `name` with the group name is case-sensitive. 如果`name`不对应到捕获组的名称或捕获组，该方法的数字的字符串表示形式返回-1。If `name` does not correspond to the name of a capturing group or to the string representation of the number of a capturing group, the method returns -1.

summary.span: 指定模式匹配操作不应超时。

span.span: Specifies that a pattern-matching operation should not time out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类构造函数和静态匹配方法使用常量，以指示尝试查找模式匹配应不会超时。The class constructor and a number of static matching methods use the constant to indicate that the attempt to find a pattern match should not time out. > [!WARNING] > 将正则表达式引擎的超时值设置为可能会导致依赖于过度回溯，才会出现停止响应时处理与正则表达式模式大致匹配的文本的正则表达式。Setting the regular expression engine's time-out value to can cause regular expressions that rely on excessive backtracking to appear to stop responding when processing text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern. 如果禁用超时，应确保正则表达式不依赖于过度回溯，还可以处理与正则表达式模式大致匹配的文本。If you disable time-outs, you should ensure that your regular expression does not rely on excessive backtracking and that it handles text that nearly matches the regular expression pattern. > > 有关处理回溯的详细信息，请参阅[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information about handling backtracking, see [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md). 常量可作为的值提供`matchTimeout`自变量的以下成员：The constant can be supplied as the value of the `matchTimeout` argument of the following members: - - - - - - - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用于验证字符串或以确保符合特定模式的一个字符串，而无需检索该字符串以进行后续操作。The method is typically used to validate a string or to ensure that a string conforms to a particular pattern without retrieving that string for subsequent manipulation. 如果你想要确定是否一个或多个字符串与正则表达式模式匹配，然后检索成员以进行后续操作，调用或方法。If you want to determine whether one or more strings match a regular expression pattern and then retrieve them for subsequent manipulation, call the or method. 如果匹配操作的执行时间超出了指定的超时间隔将引发异常构造函数。The exception is thrown if the execution time of the matching operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the constructor. 如果操作超过在其中应用程序域建立任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常创建对象。If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the object is created. 如果在中定义没有超时设定构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值，不会引发异常。If no time-out is defined in the constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is , no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定字符串是否是有效的部件号。The following example illustrates the use of the method to determine whether a string is a valid part number. 正则表达式假定的部件号具有特定格式包含三个由连字符分隔的字符组成。The regular expression assumes that the part number has a specific format that consists of three sets of characters separated by hyphens. 第一个集，其中包含四个字符，必须由字母数字字符后跟两个数字字符后跟字母数字字符组成。The first set, which contains four characters, must consist of an alphanumeric character followed by two numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. 第二个集，其中包括三个字符，必须为数值。The second set, which consists of three characters, must be numeric. 第三个组，其中包括四个字符，必须以字母数字字符后跟三个数字字符。The third set, which consists of four characters, must have three numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/cs/ismatch2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/vb/ismatch2.vb#2)] 正则表达式模式为：The regular expression pattern is: ``` ^[a-zA-Z0-9]\d{2}[a-zA-Z0-9](-\d{3}){2}[A-Za-z0-9]$ ``` 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`^`|开始在行的开头匹配。Begin the match at the beginning of the line.| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`\d{2}`|匹配两个数字字符。Match two numeric characters.| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`-`|匹配连字符。Match a hyphen.| |`\d{3}`|匹配三个数字字符。Match exactly three numeric characters.| |`(-\d{3}){2}`|找到连字符后跟三个数字字符，并将匹配此模式的两个匹配项。Find a hyphen followed by three numeric characters, and match two occurrences of this pattern.| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`$`|结束行的末尾匹配。End the match at the end of the line.|

Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定字符串是否是有效的部件号。The following example illustrates the use of the method to determine whether a string is a valid part number. 它会搜索为跟随字符串中的冒号 （:） 字符的部件号。It searches for a part number that follows a colon (:) character in a string. 方法用于确定冒号字符，然后传递到的位置方法。The method is used to determine the position of the colon character, which is then passed to the method. 正则表达式假定的部件号具有特定格式包含三个由连字符分隔的字符组成。The regular expression assumes that the part number has a specific format that consists of three sets of characters separated by hyphens. 第一个集，其中包含四个字符，必须由字母数字字符后跟两个数字字符后跟字母数字字符组成。The first set, which contains four characters, must consist of an alphanumeric character followed by two numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. 第二个集，其中包括三个字符，必须为数值。The second set, which consists of three characters, must be numeric. 第三个组，其中包括四个字符，必须以字母数字字符后跟三个数字字符。The third set, which consists of four characters, must have three numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/cs/ismatch3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/vb/ismatch3.vb#3)] 正则表达式模式为：The regular expression pattern is: ``` [a-zA-Z0-9]\d{2}[a-zA-Z0-9](-\d{3}){2}[A-Za-z0-9]$ ``` 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`\d{2}`|匹配两个数字字符。Match two numeric characters.| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`-`|匹配连字符。Match a hyphen.| |`\d{3}`|匹配三个数字字符。Match exactly three numeric characters.| |`(-\d{3}){2}`|找到连字符后跟三个数字字符，并将匹配此模式的两个匹配项。Find a hyphen followed by three numeric characters, and match two occurrences of this pattern.| |`[a-zA-Z0-9]`|匹配的单个字母字符 (`a`通过`z`或`A`通过`Z`) 或数字字符。Match a single alphabetic character (`a` through `z` or `A` through `Z`) or numeric character.| |`$`|结束行的末尾匹配。End the match at the end of the line.|

This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which the method is called. If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value , which prevents the method from timing out, is used. The recommended static method for verifying a pattern match is , which lets you set the time-out interval.

span.para: 此方法等同于调用它的应用程序域的默认超时值的时间间隔后将会超时。如果不为应用程序域，值定义超时值，这样可以防止不会超时，该方法使用。推荐的静态方法用于验证的模式匹配是，它允许您设置的超时间隔。

This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is called. If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value , which prevents the method from timing out, is used. The recommended static method for verifying a pattern match is , which lets you set the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通常用于验证字符串或以确保符合特定模式的一个字符串，而无需检索该字符串以进行后续操作。The method is typically used to validate a string or to ensure that a string conforms to a particular pattern without retrieving that string for subsequent manipulation. 如果你想要确定是否一个或多个字符串与正则表达式模式匹配，然后检索成员以进行后续操作，调用或方法。If you want to determine whether one or more strings match a regular expression pattern and then retrieve them for subsequent manipulation, call the or method. 静态方法等效于构造对象使用指定的正则表达式模式`pattern`和指定的正则表达式选项`options`并调用实例方法。The static method is equivalent to constructing a object with the regular expression pattern specified by `pattern` and the regular expression options specified by `options` and calling the instance method. 此正则表达式模式由正则表达式引擎缓存供快速检索。This regular expression pattern is cached for rapid retrieval by the regular expression engine. `pattern`参数包含的符号描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)并[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). `matchTimeout`参数指定如何长时间模式匹配方法应尝试超时之前找到匹配项。将设置的超时间隔可阻止依赖于过度回溯出现停止响应时它们处理输入的正则表达式，其中包含接近的匹配项。The `matchTimeout` parameter specifies how long a pattern matching method should try to find a match before it times out. Setting a time-out interval prevents regular expressions that rely on excessive backtracking from appearing to stop responding when they process input that contains near matches. 有关详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式的最佳实践](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md)并[回溯](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/best-practices.md) and [Backtracking](~/docs/standard/base-types/backtracking-in-regular-expressions.md). 如果在该时间间隔内不找到任何匹配项，则该方法将引发异常。If no match is found in that time interval, the method throws a exception. `matchTimeout` 重写应用程序域执行该方法定义的任何默认超时值。`matchTimeout` overrides any default time-out value defined for the application domain in which the method executes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来确定字符串是否是有效的部件号。The following example illustrates the use of the method to determine whether a string is a valid part number. 正则表达式假定的部件号具有特定格式包含三个由连字符分隔的字符组成。The regular expression assumes that the part number has a specific format that consists of three sets of characters separated by hyphens. 第一个集，其中包含四个字符，必须由字母数字字符后跟两个数字字符后跟字母数字字符组成。The first set, which contains four characters, must consist of an alphanumeric character followed by two numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. 第二个集，其中包括三个字符，必须为数值。The second set, which consists of three characters, must be numeric. 第三个组，其中包括四个字符，必须以字母数字字符后跟三个数字字符。The third set, which consists of four characters, must have three numeric characters followed by an alphanumeric character. 匹配正则表达式模式应涉及最少搜索输入字符串，因此，该方法设置的超时间隔为 500 毫秒。Matching the regular expression pattern should involve minimal searching through the input string, so the method sets a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/cs/ismatch5.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.IsMatch#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.ismatch/vb/ismatch5.vb#5)] 正则表达式模式为：The regular expression pattern is: ``` ^[A-Z0-9]\d{2}[A-Z0-9](-\d{3}){2}[A-Z0-9]$ ``` 下表演示了如何解释正则表达式模式。The following table shows how the regular expression pattern is interpreted. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`^`|从字符串开头开始匹配。Begin the match at the beginning of the string.| |`[A-Z0-9]`|匹配任何单个字母字符`A`通过`Z`，或任意数字字符。Match any single alphabetic character from `A` through `Z`, or any numeric character.| |`\d{2}`|匹配两个数字字符。Match two numeric characters.| |`[A-Z0-9]`|匹配任何单个字母字符`A`通过`Z`，或任意数字字符。Match any single alphabetic character from `A` through `Z`, or any numeric character.| |`-`|匹配连字符。Match a hyphen.| |`\d{3}`|匹配三个数字字符。Match exactly three numeric characters.| |`(-\d{3}){2}`|找到连字符后跟三个数字字符，并将匹配此模式的两个匹配项。Find a hyphen followed by three numeric characters, and match two occurrences of this pattern.| |`[A-Z0-9]`|匹配任何单个字母字符`A`通过`Z`，或任意数字字符。Match any single alphabetic character from `A` through `Z`, or any numeric character.| |`$`|在字符串的结尾结束匹配。End the match at the end of the string.| 调用方法替换`options`参数设置为等效于定义以下正则表达式：Calling the method with the `options` parameter set to is equivalent to defining the following regular expression: ``` [a-zA-Z0-9]\d{2}[a-zA-Z0-9](-\d{3}){2}[A-Za-z0-9] ``` 有关比较，请参阅示例方法。For comparison, see the example for the method.

span.para: 我们建议您将设置为适当的值，如两秒的参数。如果通过指定禁用超时，正则表达式引擎提供了略有更好的性能。但是，应禁用超时值仅在以下情况下:-当输入由正则表达式处理派生自已知和受信任的来源或包含静态文本。这不包括具有动态已由用户输入的文本。 -当经过全面测试正则表达式模式以确保它有效地处理匹配，不匹配，并不久匹配。 -当正则表达式模式不包含任何已知会导致过度回溯，处理接近的匹配项时的语言元素。

We recommend that you set the parameter to an appropriate value, such as two seconds. If you disable time-outs by specifying , the regular expression engine offers slightly better performance. However, you should disable time-outs only under the following conditions: - When the input processed by a regular expression is derived from a known and trusted source or consists of static text. This excludes text that has been dynamically input by users. - When the regular expression pattern has been thoroughly tested to ensure that it efficiently handles matches, non-matches, and near matches. - When the regular expression pattern contains no language elements that are known to cause excessive backtracking when processing a near match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回输入字符串中的正则表达式模式匹配的第一个子字符串。The method returns the first substring that matches a regular expression pattern in an input string. 有关用于生成正则表达式模式的语言元素的信息，请参阅[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For information about the language elements used to build a regular expression pattern, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 您可以确定是否正则表达式模式已找到输入字符串中通过检查所返回的值对象的属性。You can determine whether the regular expression pattern has been found in the input string by checking the value of the returned object's property. 如果找到匹配项，返回对象的属性包含的子字符串从`input`匹配正则表达式模式。If a match is found, the returned object's property contains the substring from `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则其值是。If no match is found, its value is . 此方法返回中的第一个子字符串`input`匹配正则表达式模式。This method returns the first substring in `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 您可以通过重复调用返回检索后续匹配项对象的方法。You can retrieve subsequent matches by repeatedly calling the returned object's method. 此外可以通过调用来检索单个方法调用中的所有匹配方法。You can also retrieve all matches in a single method call by calling the method. 如果匹配操作的执行时间超出了指定的超时间隔将引发异常构造函数。The exception is thrown if the execution time of the matching operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the constructor. 如果操作超过在其中应用程序域建立任何超时值时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常创建对象。If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exceeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the object is created. 如果在中定义没有超时设定构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值，不会引发异常。If no time-out is defined in the constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is , no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例查找正则表达式模式匹配在字符串中，然后列出匹配组、 捕获的内容和捕获位置。The following example finds regular expression pattern matches in a string, then lists the matched groups, captures, and capture positions. [!code-cpp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cpp/snippet8.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/cs/snippet8.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Regex Match, NextMatch, Groups, Captures#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/regex match, nextmatch, groups, captures/vb/snippet8.vb#8)] 正则表达式模式`(\w+)\s+(car)`匹配单词"car"以及它前面的字词的匹配项。The regular expression pattern `(\w+)\s+(car)` matches occurrences of the word "car" along with the word that precedes it. 它被解释为下表中所示。It is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`(\w+)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符。Match one or more word characters. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`\s+`|匹配一个或多个空白字符。Match one or more white-space characters.| |(car)(car)|匹配文本字符串"car"。Match the literal string "car". 这是第二个捕获组。This is the second capturing group.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回与匹配正则表达式模式，启动时或之后的第一个子字符串`startat`字符位置，在输入字符串中。The method returns the first substring that matches a regular expression pattern, starting at or after the `startat` character position, in an input string. 有关用于生成正则表达式模式的语言元素的信息，请参阅[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For information about the language elements used to build a regular expression pattern, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 为其正则表达式模式方法搜索定义之一调用类构造函数。The regular expression pattern for which the method searches is defined by the call to one of the class constructors. 有关元素构成的正则表达式模式的详细信息，请参阅[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For more information about the elements that can form a regular expression pattern, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 可以选择通过使用指定字符串中的起始位置`startat`参数。You can optionally specify a starting position in the string by using the `startat` parameter. 当正则表达式引擎分析从左到右 （默认值） 时，匹配和扫描将移向右，从中指定的字符处开始`startat`。When the regular expression engine parses from left to right (the default), the match and the scan move rightward, starting at the character specified in `startat`. 正则表达式引擎从右到左的分析时 (当正则表达式模式构造与选项)，匹配和扫描中相反方向移动，以在字符开头`startat`-1。When the regular expression engine parses from right to left (when the regular expression pattern is constructed with the option), the match and scan move in the opposite direction and begin with the character at `startat` -1. 如果未指定起始位置，开始为默认值执行搜索`startat`位置。If you do not specify a starting position, the search begins at the default `startat` position. 如果正则表达式进行搜索，从左到右，默认值`startat`位置位于的左端`input`; 如果它将搜索从右到左，默认`startat`位置位于右端的`input`。If the regular expression searches from left to right, the default `startat` position is at the left end of `input`; if it searches from right to left, the default `startat` position is at the right end of `input`. 如果你想要限制匹配项，以便它在字符串中特定的字符位置开始，并且正则表达式引擎不会扫描匹配项的字符串的其余部分，定位到正则表达式和`\G`（在从左到右的左侧模式中，或从右到左模式右侧)。If you want to restrict a match so that it begins at a particular character position in the string and the regular expression engine does not scan the remainder of the string for a match, anchor the regular expression with a `\G` (at the left for a left-to-right pattern, or at the right for a right-to-left pattern). 这会限制匹配，因此它必须恰好在启动`startat`。This restricts the match so it must start exactly at `startat`. 您可以确定是否正则表达式模式已找到输入字符串中通过检查所返回的值对象的属性。You can determine whether the regular expression pattern has been found in the input string by checking the value of the returned object's property. 如果找到匹配项，返回对象的属性包含的子字符串从`input`匹配正则表达式模式。If a match is found, the returned object's property contains the substring from `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则其值是。If no match is found, its value is . 此方法返回找到时或之后的第一个子字符串`startat`的字符位置`input`匹配正则表达式模式。This method returns the first substring found at or after the `startat` character position in `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 您可以通过重复调用返回检索后续匹配项对象的方法。You can retrieve subsequent matches by repeatedly calling the returned object's method. 此外可以通过调用来检索单个方法调用中的所有匹配方法。You can also retrieve all matches in a single method call by calling the method. 如果匹配操作的执行时间超出了指定的超时间隔将引发异常构造函数。The exception is thrown if the execution time of the matching operation exceeds the time-out interval specified by the constructor. 如果操作超过任何超时值来建立在其中应用程序域时调用的构造函数未设置的超时间隔，如果引发异常创建对象。If you do not set a time-out interval when you call the constructor, the exception is thrown if the operation exeeds any time-out value established for the application domain in which the object is created. 如果在中定义没有超时设定构造函数调用或在应用程序域的属性中，或如果超时值，不会引发异常。If no time-out is defined in the constructor call or in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is , no exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回输入字符串中的正则表达式模式匹配的第一个子字符串。The method returns the first substring that matches a regular expression pattern in an input string. 有关用于生成正则表达式模式的语言元素的信息，请参阅[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For information about the language elements used to build a regular expression pattern, see [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 静态方法等效于构造对象使用指定的正则表达式模式，并调用实例方法。The static method is equivalent to constructing a object with the specified regular expression pattern and calling the instance method. 在这种情况下，正则表达式引擎缓存正则表达式模式。In this case, the regular expression engine caches the regular expression pattern. `pattern`参数包含的符号描述要匹配的字符串的正则表达式语言元素。The `pattern` parameter consists of regular expression language elements that symbolically describe the string to match. 有关正则表达式的详细信息，请参阅[.NET Framework 正则表达式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)并[正则表达式语言-快速参考](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md)。For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md) and [Regular Expression Language - Quick Reference](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expression-language-quick-reference.md). 您可以确定是否正则表达式模式已找到输入字符串中通过检查所返回的值对象的属性。You can determine whether the regular expression pattern has been found in the input string by checking the value of the returned object's property. 如果找到匹配项，返回对象的属性包含的子字符串从`input`匹配正则表达式模式。If a match is found, the returned object's property contains the substring from `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则其值是。If no match is found, its value is . 此方法返回中的第一个子字符串`input`匹配正则表达式模式。This method returns the first substring in `input` that matches the regular expression pattern. 您可以通过重复调用返回检索后续匹配项对象的方法。You can retrieve subsequent matches by repeatedly calling the returned object's method. 此外可以通过调用来检索单个方法调用中的所有匹配方法。You can also retrieve all matches in a single method call by calling the method. 如果匹配操作的执行时间超出了指定的方法称为应用程序域的超时间隔将引发异常。The exception is thrown if the execution time of the matching operation exceeds the time-out interval specified for the application domain in which the method is called. 如果在应用程序域的属性中，定义无超时或超时值，即，不会引发异常。If no time-out is defined in the application domain's properties, or if the time-out value is , no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法以查找包含至少一个的第一个单词`z`字符，然后调用方法查找任何其他匹配项。The following example calls the method to find the first word that contains at least one `z` character, and then calls the method to find any additional matches. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.match/cs/match1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.match/vb/match1.vb#1)] 正则表达式模式 `\b\w*z+\w*\b` 的含义如下表所示。The regular expression pattern `\b\w*z+\w*\b` is interpreted as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|在单词边界处开始匹配。Begin the match at a word boundary.| |`\w*`|匹配零个、 一个或多个单词字符。Match zero, one, or more word characters.| |`z+`|匹配一个或多个匹配项的`z`字符。Match one or more occurrences of the `z` character.| |`\w*`|匹配零个、 一个或多个单词字符。Match zero, one, or more word characters.| |`\b`|在单词边界处结束匹配。End the match at a word boundary.|

This method times out after an interval that is equal to the default time-out value of the application domain in which it is called. If a time-out value has not been defined for the application domain, the value , which prevents the method from timing out, is used. The recommended static method for retrieving a pattern match is , which lets you set the time-out interval.
